name: akkoma
description: Akkoma is a lightweight fork of the Pleroma social networking server, built on ActivityPub for federated microblogging. It offers lower resource usage, customization, federation, and is ideal for self-hosting private or public social communities.

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Lower resource usage than alternatives, runs on modest hardware. Efficient and fast

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Self-host for complete control over your social data. No corporate surveillance

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Support for images, videos, polls, and custom emoji. Express yourself fully

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Works seamlessly with various mobile apps and clients. Post from anywhere
